prompt: This mesmerizing image depicts a scene of futuristic law enforcement in the far reaches of the galaxy. An imposing alien riot police robot, adorned in intricate armor and armed with advanced weaponry, sits majestically atop a graceful alien-like elephant. The backdrop showcases a towering futuristic spaceship, with dazzling lights and sleek metallic structures. Drawn in the style reminiscent of Rafal Olbinski, the composition blends surrealism and science fiction to create a truly unique and captivating visual experience.
